title: P.B.A.G.
description: The lost pilot for P.B.A.G. (Pranked By A Girl) featuring three members of 2000s girl group Girls5Eva.
alt1: the man driving a limosine with a woman in the front seat and a cardboard cutout of Elijah Wood in the backseat
alt2: a dummy being hit by the limo
alt4: the man frightened by a person wearing an old man mask
